name: fila-backoffice
description: Backoffice para sistema de fila digital

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:stage && npm run version:deploy
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:stage && npm run version:deploy
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:stage && npm run version:deploy
scripts.version:stage: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const [major, minor, patch] = pkg.version.split('.'); pkg.version = major + '.' + minor + '.' + patch + '-stage'; require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2) + '\n');"
scripts.version:prod-patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:prod-deploy
scripts.version:prod-minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:prod-deploy
scripts.version:prod-major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:prod-deploy
